nl: All mammals are animals. All cats are mammals. Therefore, all cats are animals.
All mammals are animals. All dogs are mammals. Therefore, all dogs are animals.
All birds can fly. Penguins are birds. Therefore, penguins can fly.
All humans are mortal. Socrates is a human. Therefore, Socrates is mortal.
All fish can swim. Salmon are fish. Therefore, salmon can swim.
All philosophers think deeply. Plato is a philosopher. Therefore, Plato thinks deeply.
All metals conduct electricity. Copper is a metal. Therefore, copper conducts electricity.
All students study. Alice is a student. Therefore, Alice studies.
All plants need water. Roses are plants. Therefore, roses need water.
All cats are mammals. All mammals are animals. Therefore, all animals are cats.
All dogs bark. All cats meow. Therefore, all dogs are cats.
Some birds are blue. Some blue things are cold. Therefore, some birds are cold.
All reptiles are vertebrates. All vertebrates are animals. All snakes are reptiles. Therefore, all snakes are animals.
No mammals are reptiles. All dogs are mammals. Therefore, no dogs are reptiles.
No cats are dogs. All dogs are animals. Therefore, no cats are animals.
All vehicles are used for transportation. All cars are vehicles. Therefore, all cars are used for transportation.
All professional athletes train daily. Michael is a professional athlete. Therefore, Michael trains daily.
All doctors have medical degrees. Sarah is a doctor. Therefore, Sarah has a medical degree.
All planets orbit a star. Earth is a planet. Therefore, Earth orbits a star.
All triangles have three angles. This shape is a triangle. Therefore, this shape has three angles.
All roses are flowers. All tulips are flowers. Therefore, all roses are tulips.
All cats are furry. This animal is furry. Therefore, this animal is a cat.
All lawyers can argue in court. James is a lawyer. Therefore, James can argue in court.
All trees have roots. An oak is a tree. Therefore, an oak has roots.
All rectangles have four right angles. A square is a rectangle. Therefore, a square has four right angles.
All writers read extensively. Stephen is a writer. Therefore, Stephen reads extensively.
All teachers educate students. Ms. Johnson is a teacher. Therefore, Ms. Johnson educates students.
All musicians practice their instruments. David is a musician. Therefore, David practices his instrument.
All A are B. All B are C. All C are D. All X are A. Therefore, all X are D.
If it rains, the ground is wet. It is not raining. Therefore, the ground is not wet.
If it rains, the ground is wet. It is raining. Therefore, the ground is wet.
If it rains, the ground is wet. The ground is not wet. Therefore, it is not raining.
Either it is Monday or it is Tuesday. It is not Monday. Therefore, it is Tuesday.
If A then B. If B then C. A is true. Therefore, C is true.
All dogs bark. This animal does not bark. Therefore, this animal is not a dog.
Alice is taller than Bob. Bob is taller than Carol. Therefore, Alice is taller than Carol.
All apples are fruits. All fruits grow on plants. Therefore, all apples grow on plants.
All insects have six legs. A bee is an insect. Therefore, a bee has six legs.
All whales are mammals. All mammals breathe air. Therefore, all whales breathe air.
All diamonds are made of carbon. This gemstone is a diamond. Therefore, this gemstone is made of carbon.
